# File lib\Win32/Console.rb, line 483
     def SetConsoleMode( hConsoleHandle, lpMode )
       if @@m_SetConsoleMode == nil
          @@m_SetConsoleMode = Win32API.new( "kernel32", "SetConsoleMode", 
                                            ['l', 'p'], 'l' )
       end
       @@m_SetConsoleMode.call( hConsoleHandle, lpMode )
     end
